ProjectTitle: DeVEnIR: defining vulvovaginal candidiasis - Elements of infection and remedy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
11/04/2024
Ethics: according to the CMT you have ethical approval at Antwerp University, please mention this in de DMP and list the approval number(s). Are you sure you don't process any personal data, i.e. do you only work with fully anonymous samples? Please check this, normally this is included in the ethical application but I'm not sure this is also the case at Antwerp; will you process personal data at KU Leuven, in that case please have a look at https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy.
